message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $100 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go any higher than my initial offer of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $110, so I'll offer the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product!
